description: The biggest mistake Western governments made was to assume that time worked in their favour. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Two years on, what has gone wrong with the Western strategy on Ukraine against Russia?
title_page: Two years on, what has gone wrong with the Western strategy on Ukraine against Russia? | The Straits Times
maintext:
LONDON â€“ When Russian troops launched their all-out invasion of Ukraine on Feb 24, 2022, nobody believed that Ukraine could last for more than just a few weeks.
Yet two years on, Ukraine remains independent and the government of President Volodymyr Zelensky, which Russia was so determined to overthrow, not only survived intact but has also not budged from Kyiv, the capital.
